text:
Hello,

I have built some scenarios where i am populating my hubdb tables from external sources using API.

I have a current scenario where i want to fetch data from a custom object into a hubdb table. is this possible?
Is anyone knows how to show future events in the dynamic page? can anyone give a link or idea how to do it ? anyone help well apreciate thank you
on a time interval basis? i.e. cron job?
